name: The Airlie Beach Sightseeing Bus
description: Experience the Whitsundays' mainland in a relaxed, eco-certified day tour with The Airlie Beach Sightseeing Bus. Perfect for first-time visitors, families, and couples, enjoy a blend of local coffee culture, rainforest swimming, and a classic Aussie lunch stop. This tour offers a comfortable, guided exploration of the Whitsundays region, allowing you to unwind and enjoy the scenery without the hassle of planning or driving. With friendly local guides and air-conditioned comfort, this tour is ideal for those seeking a fun and easygoing adventure.
includes:
Your seat on our air-conditioned minibus
Water bottle refills
Travel snacks (lollies, chocolates, popcorn)
highlights:
Relaxed, guided day tour of Airlie Beach
Visit Whitsundays Gold Coffee Plantation
Swim and explore the rainforest at Cedar Creek Falls
Lunch stop at George's Diner (meals available to purchase)
Comfortable transport and local guiding
ideal_for: First-time visitors, couples, families, and anyone wanting a comfortable, guided day exploring the Whitsundays region

name: Cedar Creek Express Tour from Airlie Beach
description: Experience a refreshing escape into the lush hinterland with the Cedar Creek Express Tour. This eco-certified adventure takes you from Airlie Beach to the serene Cedar Creek Falls, a rainforest waterhole and waterfall nestled in a natural rock amphitheatre. Perfect for couples, families, and solo travelers, this half-day tour offers a peaceful retreat from the bustling beach crowds. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of the rainforest, enjoy a refreshing swim, and connect with nature in one of the Whitsundays' hidden gems.
departure_location: lue bus stops in the lagoon car park behind the Deck Cafe.
includes:
Seat on air-conditioned minibus
Morning or afternoon tea
Water bottle refills
Travel snacks
highlights:
Eco-certified touring with a nature-first focus
Short and sweet: ideal for a half-day adventure
Fully guided experience with local insights
Rainforest freshwater close to Airlie Beach
Perfect for a refreshing swim away from crowds
ideal_for: Visitors seeking a nature escape, families looking for a guided outing, couples wanting a scenic adventure, and anyone keen for a swim away from beach crowds.

name: Eungella Wild Platypus Encounter – Eco-Certified Day Tour from Airlie Beach (Whitsundays)
description: Swap salty sea air for cool mountain mist on the Eungella Wild Platypus Encounter, an eco-certified day tour from Airlie Beach into the lush rainforest of Eungella National Park. This adventure offers a rewarding mainland experience with scenic lookouts, rainforest boardwalks, and the chance to spot a wild platypus in its natural habitat. Ideal for nature lovers, photographers, and families, this tour provides an authentic wildlife experience with no enclosures or staged moments. Enjoy the journey as the landscape transforms from tropical shoreline to misty mountain ranges, guided by a knowledgeable local who shares insights and stories. Experience the thrill of wildlife spotting in the wild, with the highlight being the renowned Broken River region, known for its platypus sightings.
includes:
Eco-certified, low-impact practices
Friendly local guide
Lunch at the Pinnacle Pub
Scenic inland drive with local commentary
Guided spotting tips and quiet observation at Broken River
Short, easy walks and boardwalk sections
highlights:
Experience the lush rainforest of Eungella National Park
Spot wild platypus in their natural habitat at Broken River
Enjoy scenic lookouts and rainforest boardwalks
Travel with a knowledgeable local guide
Lunch at the Pinnacle Pub included
Eco-certified, nature-first touring
ideal_for: Nature lovers, photographers, couples, families, and travelers seeking a genuine wildlife day trip from Airlie Beach.

name: Eco Wildlife Two-Day Tour – Platypus & Kangaroos
description: Experience two of North Queensland’s most remarkable wildlife encounters in one unforgettable eco-certified adventure. This relaxed small-group tour offers a unique opportunity to observe the elusive wild platypus in its natural rainforest creek habitat and enjoy a sunrise with kangaroos and wallabies at Cape Hillsborough Beach. Perfect for nature enthusiasts and wildlife lovers, the tour combines comfortable cabin accommodation, guided nature walks, and authentic local food, all while ensuring a low-impact, eco-friendly experience.
includes:
Comfortable cabin accommodation
Guided nature walks
Authentic local food and hospitality
Fresh local meals, snacks, and a camp-style BBQ dinner
Travel in a 12-seat Eco Touring Vehicle
Small groups and low-impact experiences
Eco Certified by Ecotourism Australia
highlights:
Watch wild platypus in their natural rainforest creek habitat
Sunrise with kangaroos and wallabies at Cape Hillsborough Beach
Overnight stay in nature-surrounded cabins
Guided walks and wildlife interpretation from an experienced local guide
Travel in comfort in a new 12-seat Eco Touring Vehicle
Small groups and low-impact experiences – Eco Certified
ideal_for: Nature enthusiasts and wildlife lovers seeking a relaxed, eco-friendly adventure

name: Airlie Adventure Tours – Beautiful Bowen Beaches Day Tour (from Airlie Beach / Whitsundays)
description: Experience the stunning beauty of Bowen's iconic beaches with Airlie Adventure Tours. This relaxed day trip from Airlie Beach offers a perfect blend of scenic coastline, local culture, and delicious seafood. Ideal for those seeking a laid-back yet memorable escape, this tour takes you to Bowen's hidden gems, including the famous Big Mango and Flagstaff Hill Lookout. With plenty of time for beach walks, photo opportunities, and a taste of local seafood, this tour promises a day of relaxation and discovery in Tropical North Queensland.
includes:
Comfortable transport
Friendly guiding
Prawns at Bird’s Fish Bar
Glass of Yellowglen bubbles at Flagstaff Hill Lookout
Cheese, berries, and nibbles at Flagstaff Hill Lookout
highlights:
Visit the iconic Big Mango
Explore Beautiful Bowen Beaches
Enjoy local seafood at Bird’s Fish Bar
Learn about Bowen's WWII Catalina history
Experience golden-hour views at Flagstaff Hill Lookout
itinerary:
**Stop 1:** The Big Mango – Bowen’s iconic photo moment
**Stop 2:** Beautiful Bowen Beaches – bays, headlands and crystal-clear water
**Stop 3:** Bird’s Fish Bar – Fisherman’s Wharf seafood (with prawns on us)
**Stop 4:** The Catalina Display – Bowen’s WWII flying boat story
**Stop 5:** Flagstaff Hill Lookout – golden-hour views with bubbles and nibbles
ideal_for: Travelers seeking a mix of coastal beauty, local culture, and relaxed exploration.

name: Kangaroos on the Beach at Sunrise
summary: Eco-Certified Cape Hillsborough Tour from Airlie Beach
description: Experience an iconic Australian moment with the eco-certified dawn tour to Cape Hillsborough National Park. Witness the magical sight of kangaroos and wallabies emerging onto the beach as the first light spills across the sand. This tour offers a serene and unforgettable experience, perfect for those seeking a connection with nature in a wild and untouched setting. Ideal for couples, families, solo travelers, and photographers, this tour provides a unique opportunity to capture the beauty of the Australian landscape.
includes:
Hotel pickup and drop-off (selected areas)
Air-conditioned minibus seat
Entry to the national park
A hot breakfast
Water bottle refills
highlights:
Witness kangaroos and wallabies on the beach at sunrise
Eco-certified tour respecting wildlife
Guided experience with local knowledge
Hot breakfast included
Experience the natural beauty of Cape Hillsborough National Park
ideal_for: Couples, families, solo travelers, photographers, and anyone seeking a unique wildlife adventure in a natural setting.
